```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(lme4)
library(AER)
```


```{r import data}
fb.df <- read.csv("FaultBarData.csv", h=T)
fb.df$Length <- as.numeric(fb.df$Length)
fb.df$Habitat <- as.factor(fb.df$Habitat)
fb.df <- fb.df %>% drop_na(Habitat, Length)
```


```{r Length Scatter Plot}
plot(fb.df$Length)
```

```{r Length Histogram}
hist(fb.df$Length)
```



```{r}
length.mdl <- glm(Length ~ Habitat, family = "gaussian",data = fb.df)
summary(length.mdl)
```
